'''AS''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] meaning "warmth".<ref name=Elda>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 148</ref>

==Derivatives==
*[[Primitive Elvish]]: *āsi
**[[Quenya]]: [[áre|''āze'', ''āre'', ''ārĭ-'']] ("warmth, especially of the sun, sunlight"); ''[[Árien]]''; ''[[arma]]'' ("a ray of sunlight"); ''[[asta-]]'' ("to heat, bake"); ''[[ar]]'' ("day")<ref name=Elda/>
**[[Sindarin]]: ''[[as]]''
